title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 21, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 21, 2020
description:
Jason Smith and Rob Parker sit in for Dan Patrick and react to the Los Angeles Lakers evening their series with the Portland Trail Blazer. FOX Sports MLB reporter Jon Paul Morosi joins the guys to discuss the week that was in Major League Baseball and the future for Reds broadcaster Thom Brenneman. The guys talk about the Knicks losing yet another NBA Draft lottery and weigh in on the league’s shocking decline in ratings. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
